actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 regarding the issuance of interim permits for ocean dumping, and other purposes.

summary.text: Ocean Dumping Amendments Act of 1979 - Amends the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 to include a prohibition on the dumping of industrial waste into ocean waters.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 regarding the issuance of interim permits for ocean dumping, and other purposes.
